Description: An experimental extension that deletes all contents of the referenced bucket when the stack is deleted. Use with caution!
Schema: {"typeName":"AwsCommunity::S3::DeleteBucketContents","description":"An experimental extension that deletes all contents of the referenced bucket when the stack is deleted.
